config.script:
try:
		
		TtableData=self.params.rowData
		system.perspective.print("TtableData-->"+str(TtableData))
		woNo = TtableData.get('Workorder Name')
		self.session.custom.WoNumber=woNo
		PartNo = TtableData.get('Part No')
		PartNoRev = TtableData.get('PartNoRev')
		factory=TtableData.get('Factory')
		ProductionQty = TtableData.get('Production Qty')
		PEAOk = TtableData.get('PEAOk')
		LotNo = TtableData.get('LotNo')
		self.session.custom.LotNo=LotNo
		self.params.IsPrpcessed=TtableData.get('IsProcessed')
		system.perspective.print("Is Procssd"+str(self.params.IsPrpcessed))
	
		LineId = TtableData.get('LineId')
		system.perspective.print("New LineId--->"+str(LineId))
		userId=self.session.custom.UserId

		RemainingContainer= ProductionOperatorConsole.getCollectedQtyofContainer(LotNo,woNo)
		for i in (RemainingContainer):
			RemainingContainerCount=i.get('containerNotProcessed')
			system.perspective.print("RemainingContainerCount---->"+str(RemainingContainerCount))
			
			
#-------------------Write to Fileds------------------------------------------		
		self.getChild("root").getChild("LblWONo").props.text=woNo
		self.getChild("root").getChild("LblPartName").props.text=PartNo
		self.getChild("root").getChild("LblPartRev").props.text=PartNoRev
		self.getChild("root").getChild("LblCompletedLotQty").props.text=RemainingContainerCount
		self.getChild("root").getChild("NumericPEAOKQty").props.value=PEAOk
		self.getChild("root").getChild("LblLotNo").props.text=LotNo
		
#--------------------Load To Table---------------------------------------		
		woNo=self.getChild("root").getChild("LblWONo").props.text				
		revision=self.getChild("root").getChild("LblPartRev").props.text
		partNo=self.getChild("root").getChild("LblPartName").props.text	
		partNoWithoutFactory1= partNo.split("_")
		partNoWithoutFactory= partNoWithoutFactory1[0]	
		scrapByFG=0	
		totalContainerQty=0
		paradetails={"woNo":woNo,"partNo":partNo,"factory":factory,"revision":revision,"partNoWithoutFactory":partNoWithoutFactory,'scrapByFG':scrapByFG}
		system.perspective.print("paradetails-->"+str(paradetails))
		qualityScrapHistory=ProductionOperatorConsole.getQualityScrapHistory(woNo,partNo,factory,revision,partNoWithoutFactory,scrapByFG,totalContainerQty,LineId,userId)
		system.perspective.print("API Result qualityScrapHistory-->"+str(qualityScrapHistory))
		self.getChild("root").getChild("TblReportScrap").props.data=qualityScrapHistory
				
	except:
		system.perspective.print('Exception :: Quality Scrap Details')
		exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
		errorMessage = "Error:"+ str(exc_obj)
		system.perspective.print(errorMessage)
		lineno = tb.tb_lineno
		system.perspective.print(lineno)

try:
#	-------------------------------Calculate total Container Qty For Consumption-------------------
		LotNo=self.session.custom.LotNo
		WoNo=self.session.custom.WoNumber
		woNo=self.session.custom.WoNumber		
		partNo=self.getSibling("LblPartName").props.text
		partNoWithoutFactory1= partNo.split("_")
		partNoWithoutFactory= partNoWithoutFactory1[0]	
		factory= partNoWithoutFactory1[2]
		revision=self.getSibling("LblPartRev").props.text
		scrapByFG=self.getSibling("NumericScrapFG").props.value
		
		TtableData=self.view.params.rowData
		LineId = TtableData.get('LineId')
		userId=self.session.custom.UserId
		
		NoofContainers=self.getSibling("NumericContainersToApprove").props.value
		NoofContainers=int(NoofContainers)
		ContainerList=ProductionOperatorConsole.getContaineList(LotNo,WoNo)
		system.perspective.print("ContainerList API Result-->"+str(ContainerList))
		listOfGeneratedContainer=ContainerList.getRowCount()
		system.perspective.print("listOfGeneratedContainer-->"+str(listOfGeneratedContainer))
		SelectedcontainerList=[]
		totalContainerQty=0
		if NoofContainers<=listOfGeneratedContainer:
			for i in range(NoofContainers):
				LotNo=ContainerList.getValueAt(i, 'Lot No')	
				ContainerName=ContainerList.getValueAt(i, 'Container Name')
				ContainerCapacity=ContainerList.getValueAt(i, 'Production Qty')
				totalContainerQty=(int(totalContainerQty)+int(ContainerCapacity))
			system.perspective.print("totalContainerQty scrap by fg:-->"+str(totalContainerQty))
	
		
#--------------------Load To Table---------------------------------------	
			completedLotQty=self.getSibling("LblCompletedLotQty").props.text	
			PEAOkLotQty=self.getSibling("NumericPEAOKQty").props.value
			woNo=self.getSibling("LblWONo").props.text				
			revision=self.getSibling("LblPartRev").props.text
			partNo=self.getSibling("LblPartName").props.text	
			partNoWithoutFactory1= partNo.split("_")
			partNoWithoutFactory= partNoWithoutFactory1[0]	
			factory= partNoWithoutFactory1[2]	
			scrapByFG=self.props.value

			prevCompletedLot=self.getSibling("LblCompletedLotQty").props.text
			completedQtyBaseOnScrapByFG=float(completedLotQty-scrapByFG)
			totalLotcompleted=float(PEAOkLotQty+completedQtyBaseOnScrapByFG)
			qualityScrapHistory=ProductionOperatorConsole.getQualityScrapHistory(woNo,partNo,factory,revision,partNoWithoutFactory,scrapByFG,totalContainerQty,LineId,userId)
			system.perspective.print("API Result qualityScrapHistory-->"+str(qualityScrapHistory))
			self.getSibling("TblReportScrap").props.data=qualityScrapHistory	
				
#			else:
#				MessageText="Enter 'Scrap By FG' is Greater than, 'Completed Lot Qty'."
#				updaateStatus=0
#				system.perspective.openPopup('SaveUpdatePopup','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/ValidationPopups/SaveUpdatePopup',params={"MessageText":MessageText,"updaateStatus":updaateStatus},draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)
#				self.props.value=0
	except:
		system.perspective.print('Exception :: Quality SrapBy FG')
		exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
		errorMessage = "Error:"+ str(exc_obj)
		system.perspective.print(errorMessage)
		lineno = tb.tb_lineno
		system.perspective.print(lineno)

props.text: Quality Operator Console-Report Production To ERP

messageHandlers.script:
try:
		
		scrapVal=payload['value']
		selRow=payload['SelctedRowIndex']
#		system.perspective.print("scrapVal-->"+str(scrapVal))
#		system.perspective.print("selRow-->"+str(selRow))
		updatedValue=scrapVal    
		selColumn='ScrapByUnit'
		dtSet=self.props.data    
		updateRowResultDs = {selColumn:updatedValue}    
		resultpyData = system.dataset.updateRow(dtSet,selRow,updateRowResultDs)        
		ds= system.dataset.toPyDataSet(resultpyData)    
		self.props.data=ds  
		system.perspective.print("MSG Handler Done for Quality Add Update-->")  
	except Exception as e:
			system.perspective.print('Exception :msg Handler updatig PEA Scrap Value')
			exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
			errorMessage = "Error:"+ str(exc_obj)
			system.perspective.print(errorMessage)
			lineno = tb.tb_lineno
			system.perspective.print(lineno)
			sys.exit()

try:	
		tableData=self.props.data							
		scrapVal=payload['value']
		selRow=payload['SelctedRowIndex']
		preVal=tableData.getValueAt(selRow, 'Total Scrap')
#			currentVal=tableData.getValueAt(selRow, 'Ok Prod Consumption')
		currentVal=scrapVal
		UpdatedpreVal=(preVal+currentVal)
#			system.perspective.print("preVal-->"+str(preVal))
#			system.perspective.print("currentVal-->"+str(currentVal))
#			system.perspective.print("currentVal-->"+str(currentVal))
#		system.perspective.print("scrapVal-->"+str(scrapVal))
#		system.perspective.print("selRow-->"+str(selRow))
		updatedValue=float(UpdatedpreVal)    
		selColumn='Total Scrap'
		dtSet=self.props.data    
		updateRowResultDs = {selColumn:updatedValue}    
		resultpyData = system.dataset.updateRow(dtSet,selRow,updateRowResultDs)        
		ds= system.dataset.toPyDataSet(resultpyData)    
		self.props.data=ds
		system.perspective.print("MSG Handler Done For Quality cell Update-->")  
	except Exception as e:
			system.perspective.print('Exception :msg Handler Quality  updatig Cell')
			exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
			errorMessage = "Error:"+ str(exc_obj)
			system.perspective.print(errorMessage)
			lineno = tb.tb_lineno
			system.perspective.print(lineno)
			sys.exit()

config.script:
try:
	
		TtableData=self.view.params.rowData
		LineId = TtableData.get('LineId')
		userId=self.session.custom.UserId
#	-------------------------------Calculate total Container Qty For Consumption-------------------
		LotNo=self.session.custom.LotNo
		WoNo=self.session.custom.WoNumber
		woNo=self.session.custom.WoNumber		
		partNo=self.getSibling("LblPartName").props.text
		partNoWithoutFactory1= partNo.split("_")
		partNoWithoutFactory= partNoWithoutFactory1[0]	
		factory= partNoWithoutFactory1[2]
		revision=self.getSibling("LblPartRev").props.text
		scrapByFG=self.getSibling("NumericScrapFG").props.value
		
		NoofContainers=self.getSibling("NumericContainersToApprove").props.value
		NoofContainers=int(NoofContainers)
		ContainerList=ProductionOperatorConsole.getContaineList(LotNo,WoNo)
		system.perspective.print("ContainerList API Result-->"+str(ContainerList))
		listOfGeneratedContainer=ContainerList.getRowCount()
		system.perspective.print("listOfGeneratedContainer-->"+str(listOfGeneratedContainer))
		SelectedcontainerList=[]
		totalContainerQty=0
		if NoofContainers<=listOfGeneratedContainer:
			for i in range(NoofContainers):
				LotNo=ContainerList.getValueAt(i, 'Lot No')	
				ContainerName=ContainerList.getValueAt(i, 'Container Name')
				ContainerCapacity=ContainerList.getValueAt(i, 'Production Qty')
				totalContainerQty=(int(totalContainerQty)+int(ContainerCapacity))
			system.perspective.print("totalContainerQty scrap by Save:-->"+str(totalContainerQty))	
				
		woNo=self.getSibling("LblWONo").props.text
		partNo=self.getSibling("LblPartName").props.text
		userId=self.session.custom.UserId
		prodScrapDetails=self.getSibling("TblReportScrap").props.data	
		rowcount = prodScrapDetails.getRowCount()
		qaBomDetails=[]
		for i in range(rowcount):
			bomName=prodScrapDetails.getValueAt(i, "BOM Name")
			bomItemName=prodScrapDetails.getValueAt(i, "Item Name")
			bomItemRevision=prodScrapDetails.getValueAt(i, "Revision")
#			'LotNumber','ItemId','bomdetailsID','BomID'
			LotNumber=prodScrapDetails.getValueAt(i, "LotNumber")
			ItemId=prodScrapDetails.getValueAt(i, "ItemId")
			bomdetailsID=prodScrapDetails.getValueAt(i, "bomdetailsID")
			BomID=prodScrapDetails.getValueAt(i, "BomID")
#			LotNumber=prodScrapDetails.getValueAt(i, "LotNumber")
			scrapByFG1=prodScrapDetails.getValueAt(i, "ScrapByFG")
			scrapByFG=float(scrapByFG1)
			scrapByUnit1=prodScrapDetails.getValueAt(i, "scrapByUnit")
			scrapByUnit=float(scrapByUnit1)
			Description=prodScrapDetails.getValueAt(i, "Description")
			system.perspective.print('Description-->'+str(Description))
			if Description== 'null' or Description== None or Description== 'None':
				Description=''
			
			UOM=prodScrapDetails.getValueAt(i, "UOM")
			unitUsage1=prodScrapDetails.getValueAt(i, "Unit Usage")
			unitUsage=float(unitUsage1)
			totalConsumption1=prodScrapDetails.getValueAt(i, "Consumption")
			totalConsumption=float(float(totalConsumption1))
			totalScrap1=prodScrapDetails.getValueAt(i, "Total Scrap")
			totalScrap=float(totalScrap1+scrapByUnit+scrapByFG)
			bomComponentDetails1=		{
											"bomName": bomName,
											"bomItemName": bomItemName,
											"bomItemRevision":bomItemRevision,
											"scrapByUnit": scrapByUnit,
											"scrapByFG": scrapByFG,
											"unitUsage": unitUsage,
											"uom": UOM,
											"description": Description,
											"totalConsumption":totalConsumption,
											"totalScrap":totalScrap,
											"bomDetailsID": bomdetailsID,
											"itemID": ItemId,
											"bomID": BomID,
											"lineId": LineId,
											"lotNo": LotNumber
									    }
									    
					
			qaBomDetails.append(bomComponentDetails1)
			
		system.perspective.print("bomComponentDetails-->"+str(qaBomDetails))		
		scrapReportResult=ProductionOperatorConsole.reportQualityScrap(woNo,partNo,userId,qaBomDetails)
		system.perspective.print("PEA scrapReportResult-->"+str(scrapReportResult))
		if scrapReportResult==1:
			#--------------------Load To Table---------------------------------------		
			woNo=self.getSibling("LblWONo").props.text			
			revision=self.getSibling("LblPartRev").props.text
			partNo=self.getSibling("LblPartName").props.text	
			partNoWithoutFactory1= partNo.split("_")
			partNoWithoutFactory= partNoWithoutFactory1[0]	
			factory= partNoWithoutFactory1[2]	
			scrapByFG=0	
#			totalContainerQty=0
#			TotalConsumption=float(self.getChild("root").getChild("LblTotalLotQty").props.text)
			qualityScrapHistory=ProductionOperatorConsole.getQualityScrapHistory(woNo,partNo,factory,revision,partNoWithoutFactory,scrapByFG,totalContainerQty,LineId,userId)
			self.getSibling("TblReportScrap").props.data=qualityScrapHistory	
			
			

#			self.getSibling("LblCollectedQty").props.text=0
			
			MessageText="Scrap Details Saved Successfully."
			self.view.params.isSaved=1
			self.session.custom.IsQualitySaved=1
			updaateStatus=1
			system.perspective.openPopup('SaveUpdatePopup','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/ValidationPopups/SaveUpdatePopup',params={"MessageText":MessageText,"updaateStatus":updaateStatus},draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)
		
		else:
			MessageText="Fails to save scrap details."
			updaateStatus=0
			system.perspective.openPopup('SaveUpdatePopup','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/ValidationPopups/SaveUpdatePopup',params={"MessageText":MessageText,"updaateStatus":updaateStatus},draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)
	except:
		system.perspective.print('Exception :: Quality Scrap Details')
		exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
		errorMessage = "Error:"+ str(exc_obj)
		system.perspective.print(errorMessage)
		lineno = tb.tb_lineno
		system.perspective.print(lineno)

try:
#--------------------------------Posting List of Container to be Backflush---------------------
#		paralist=dict(self.view.params.ListOfContainersForApproval)		
#		system.perspective.print("paralist--->"+str(paralist))
		TtableData=self.view.params.rowData
		LineId = TtableData.get('LineId')
		userId=self.session.custom.UserId
		WoNo1=self.session.custom.WoNumber
		isSaved = self.session.custom.IsQualitySaved
		WoNo=str(WoNo1)
		ContainerName1=self.getSibling("NumericContainersToApprove").props.value
		
		ContainerName=str(ContainerName1)
		containerList=int(ContainerName1)
		TotalContainers=self.getSibling("LblCompletedLotQty").props.text
		LotNo1=self.getSibling("LblLotNo").props.text
		LotNo=str(LotNo1)
		containerPostResult=ProductionOperatorConsole.containerListUpdate(WoNo,ContainerName,LotNo)
		system.perspective.print("containerPostResult--->"+str(containerPostResult))
		IsProcessed = self.view.params.IsPrpcessed	
		isSaved=self.session.custom.IsQualitySaved		
		woNo=self.getSibling("LblWONo").props.text
		LotNo=self.getSibling("LblLotNo").props.text
		PartNo=self.getSibling("LblPartName").props.text
		UserId=self.session.custom.UserId
		if int(isSaved)==1:
			if containerPostResult==1:
				if IsProcessed!=1:
					if (containerList)>0:
						approveLotResult=ProductionOperatorConsole.ApproveLot(woNo,LotNo,PartNo,UserId)						
						system.perspective.print("approveLotResult--->"+str(approveLotResult))
						if approveLotResult==1:		
							MessageText="   Approved Successfully...!."
							updaateStatus=1
							self.view.params.isSaved=0
							system.perspective.openPopup('SaveUpdatePopup','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/ValidationPopups/SaveUpdatePopup',params={"MessageText":MessageText,"updaateStatus":updaateStatus},draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)
							self.session.custom.IsQualitySaved=0
#							system.perspective.navigate("/QualityScrapDetails")
#							system.perspective.print("TotalContainers---:"+str(TotalContainers))
#							stem.perspective.print("TotalContainers---:"+str(TotalContainers))
							if int(containerList)==int(TotalContainers):
								system.perspective.navigate("/QualityScrapDetails")
							else:
								self.getSibling("NumericContainersToApprove").props.value=0
								RemainingContainer= ProductionOperatorConsole.getCollectedQtyofContainer(LotNo,woNo)
								for i in (RemainingContainer):
									RemainingContainerCount=i.get('containerNotProcessed')
									self.getSibling("LblCompletedLotQty").props.text=RemainingContainerCount
#									system.perspective.print("RemainingContainerCount---->"+str(RemainingContainerCount))
#----------------------------Reload the Table Values-----------------------------------------------
									woNo=self.getSibling("LblWONo").props.text
													
									revision=self.getSibling("LblPartRev").props.text
									partNo=self.getSibling("LblPartName").props.text	
									partNoWithoutFactory1= partNo.split("_")
									partNoWithoutFactory= partNoWithoutFactory1[0]	
									factory= partNoWithoutFactory1[2]
									scrapByFG=0	
									totalContainerQty=0
#									
									paradetails={"woNo":woNo,"partNo":partNo,"factory":factory,"revision":revision,"partNoWithoutFactory":partNoWithoutFactory,'scrapByFG':scrapByFG}
									system.perspective.print("paradetails-->"+str(paradetails))
									qualityScrapHistory=ProductionOperatorConsole.getQualityScrapHistory(woNo,partNo,factory,revision,partNoWithoutFactory,scrapByFG,totalContainerQty,LineId,userId)
									system.perspective.print("API Result qualityScrapHistory-->"+str(qualityScrapHistory))
									self.getSibling("TblReportScrap").props.data=qualityScrapHistory
									
							
						else:
							system.perspective.print('Fail to save')
							MessageText="   Fail to Approve The Containers."
							updaateStatus=0
							self.getSibling("NumericContainersToApprove").props.value=0
							system.perspective.openPopup('SaveUpdatePopup','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/ValidationPopups/SaveUpdatePopup',params={"MessageText":MessageText,"updaateStatus":updaateStatus},draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)
					else:
						MessageText="Please Enter The No Of Containers."
						updaateStatus=0
						system.perspective.openPopup('SaveUpdatePopup','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/ValidationPopups/SaveUpdatePopup',params={"MessageText":MessageText,"updaateStatus":updaateStatus},draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)
				else:
					
					MessageText="The Selected Lot Is Already Approved."
					updaateStatus=0
					system.perspective.openPopup('SaveUpdatePopup','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/ValidationPopups/SaveUpdatePopup',params={"MessageText":MessageText,"updaateStatus":updaateStatus},draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)
			else:
							
					MessageText="Fail To Approve The Container."
					updaateStatus=0
					system.perspective.openPopup('SaveUpdatePopup','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/ValidationPopups/SaveUpdatePopup',params={"MessageText":MessageText,"updaateStatus":updaateStatus},draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)
		else:
			MessageText="Before Approve, Please Save The Scrap."
			updaateStatus=0
			system.perspective.openPopup('SaveUpdatePopup','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/ValidationPopups/SaveUpdatePopup',params={"MessageText":MessageText,"updaateStatus":updaateStatus},draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)			
	except:
		system.perspective.print('Exception :: Production Scrap Details')
		exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
		errorMessage = "Error:"+ str(exc_obj)
		system.perspective.print(errorMessage)
		lineno = tb.tb_lineno
		system.perspective.print(lineno)

try:
	#--------------------Load To Table---------------------------------------		
			woNo=self.getSibling("LblWONo").props.text				
			revision=self.getSibling("LblPartRev").props.text
			partNo=self.getSibling("LblPartName").props.text	
			partNoWithoutFactory1= partNo.split("_")
			partNoWithoutFactory= partNoWithoutFactory1[0]	
			factory= partNoWithoutFactory1[2]	
			scrapByFG=self.props.value
			TotalConsumption=self.getSibling("LblTotalLotQty").props.text
			qualityScrapHistory=ProductionOperatorConsole.getQualityScrapHistory(woNo,partNo,factory,revision,partNoWithoutFactory,scrapByFG)
			system.perspective.print("API Result qualityScrapHistory-->"+str(qualityScrapHistory))
			self.getSibling("TblReportScrap").props.data=qualityScrapHistory	
	except:
		system.perspective.print('Exception :: Quality PEA Ok')
		exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
		errorMessage = "Error:"+ str(exc_obj)
		system.perspective.print(errorMessage)
		lineno = tb.tb_lineno
		system.perspective.print(lineno)

try:
		LotNo=self.session.custom.LotNo
		WoNo=self.session.custom.WoNumber
		woNo=self.session.custom.WoNumber		
		partNo=self.getSibling("LblPartName").props.text
		partNoWithoutFactory1= partNo.split("_")
		partNoWithoutFactory= partNoWithoutFactory1[0]	
		factory= partNoWithoutFactory1[2]
		revision=self.getSibling("LblPartRev").props.text
		scrapByFG=self.getSibling("NumericScrapFG").props.value
		
		TtableData=self.view.params.rowData
		LineId = TtableData.get('LineId')
		userId=self.session.custom.UserId
		
		NoofContainers=self.props.value
		NoofContainers=int(NoofContainers)
		ContainerList=ProductionOperatorConsole.getContaineList(LotNo,WoNo)
		system.perspective.print("ContainerList API Result-->"+str(ContainerList))
		listOfGeneratedContainer=ContainerList.getRowCount()
		system.perspective.print("listOfGeneratedContainer-->"+str(listOfGeneratedContainer))
		SelectedcontainerList=[]
		totalContainerQty=0
		if NoofContainers<=listOfGeneratedContainer:
			for i in range(NoofContainers):
				LotNo=ContainerList.getValueAt(i, 'Lot No')	
				ContainerName=ContainerList.getValueAt(i, 'Container Name')
				ContainerCapacity=ContainerList.getValueAt(i, 'Production Qty')
				totalContainerQty=(int(totalContainerQty)+int(ContainerCapacity))
				system.perspective.print("ContainerCapacity---->"+str(ContainerCapacity))
				NoofContainersselected=i+1
				system.perspective.print("NoofContainersselected---->"+str(NoofContainersselected))
				paraList={
			      "workorderNo": WoNo,
			      "containerId": ContainerName,
			      "lotNo": LotNo
			    }
				SelectedcontainerList.append(paraList)
				
			qualityScrapHistory=ProductionOperatorConsole.getQualityScrapHistory(woNo,partNo,factory,revision,partNoWithoutFactory,scrapByFG,totalContainerQty,LineId,userId)
			self.getSibling("TblReportScrap").props.data=qualityScrapHistory	
			system.perspective.print("Scrap Column--->"+str(qualityScrapHistory))

			
			system.perspective.print("totalContainerQty--->"+str(totalContainerQty))		
			system.perspective.print("containerList--->"+str(SelectedcontainerList))
#			paralist={
#													  "cDetails":SelectedcontainerList
#								}	
			self.view.params.ListOfContainersForApproval=(SelectedcontainerList)
		else:
			MessageText="No. Of generated Container is "+str(listOfGeneratedContainer)+". Can Not enter Container More than Generated Qty."
			updaateStatus=0
			system.perspective.openPopup('SaveUpdatePopup','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/ValidationPopups/SaveUpdatePopup',params={"MessageText":MessageText,"updaateStatus":updaateStatus},draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)

		
	except:
		system.perspective.print('Exception :: Quality SrapBy FG1')
		exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
		errorMessage = "Error:"+ str(exc_obj)
		system.perspective.print(errorMessage)
		lineno = tb.tb_lineno
		system.perspective.print(lineno)
